share.aboutCompany: HCL Technologies is an Indian multinational information technology (IT) services and consulting company, headquartered in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India. It is a subsidiary of HCL Enterprise.
Tata Steel Limited is an Indian multinational steel-making company based in Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, and is headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. It is a subsidiary of the Tata Group.

JK Cement has over four decades of experience in cement manufacturing. We have integrated cement manufacturing plants and split grinding units, which are strategically located near our limestone mines and are well connected to the end-markets by road and rail networks.
